name: CaTSCAN
description:
Welcome to CaTSCAN, an interactive virtual pet with a twist! Guided by Dr. Stuffles, you will be taken through the process of treating various forms of cancer using the CaTSCAN Device! Play through charming minigames to learn how these treatment methods work and what they are used for.

CaTSCAN was made as part of a week-long game jam in collaboration with The Big C, a cancer charity, and is targeted towards children. It is meant only to inform and in no way meant to make fun of people effected by this disease.

Controls:

Left - Left Button
Up - Middle Button
Right - Right Button
Alt+F4 - Quit

Note: This game is designed to be easily transferrable to mobile so all the buttons on the CaTSCAN Device are interactable with the mouse.
